snippet.title: Weird Park: Scary Tales
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1azAN6z
iPhone:http://bigfi.sh/17QHVGG

Louis the Clown and Mr. Dudley are back in an all-new adventure that will take you through the dark corners of history's most famous fairy tales! 

• MAKE YOUR WAY THROUGH TWISTED FAIRY TALES 
Use your skills and intellect to find hidden objects and solve puzzles as you make your way through the stories of Cinderella, Peter Pan and more! 

• LOUIS THE CLOWN IS UP TO HIS OLD TRICKS 
He has casted each child in the role of a legendary fairytale character and creates challenging puzzles for you to solve in order to save them! 

• YOU'VE BEEN THRUST INTO A FRIGHTENING WORLD! 
Explore this amazing Hidden Object game with its spellbinding story, over 50 extraordinary locations and stunning cinematics! 

• CAN YOU RESCUE THE CHILDREN? 
They've been trapped in a frightening netherworld and need your help to escape Louis and his gang of misfits! 

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
